Crit chance increased by {[ArtifactsAbilityTable.GlobalPerk_Artifact_Set1_HeavyHands.CritChance * 100]}%, but crit damage reduced by up to {[ArtifactsAbilityTable.GlobalPerk_Artifact_Set1_HeavyHands.CritDamage * -100]}%.
Stun, Slow, and Root effects base duration is reduced by {[ArtifactsAbilityTable.GlobalPerk_Artifact_Set1_HeavyLegs.StatusEffectDurationReduction * -100]}%.
Reduce the base duration of non-crowd controlling debuffs on you by {[ArtifactsAbilityTable.GlobalPerk_Artifact_Set1_MediumHead.StatusEffectDurationReduction * -100]}%.
When you hit a foe that is below half health, transfer one debuff ({[ArtifactsAbilityTable.GlobalPerk_Artifact_Set1_MediumHands.ActivationCooldown]}s cooldown).
Base duration of hastes on you is increase by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Perk_Artifact_Set1_MediumFeetHasteDuration.EffectDurationMods_Tooltip * 100]}%.

You're immune to damage for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Perk_Artifact_Set1_LightHandsInvuln.BaseDuration]}s after you weapon swap ({[ArtifactsAbilityTable.GlobalPerk_Artifact_Set1_LightHands.ActivationCooldown]}s cooldown).
Incoming ranged attacks deal {[ArtifactsAbilityTable.GlobalPerk_Artifact_Set1_LightLegs.BaseDamageReduction * 100]}% less damage to you.

Successfully dodging an attack, gives you {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Perk_Artifact_Set1_LightFeetEmpower.DMGStandard * 100]}% empower and {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Perk_Artifact_Set1_LightFeetFortify.PhysicalArmor * 100]}% fortify for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Perk_Artifact_Set1_LightFeetEmpower.BaseDuration]}s, you are also healed for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Perk_Artifact_Set1_LightFeetHeal.Health]} + {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Perk_Artifact_Set1_LightFeetHeal.HealthModifierPercent * 100]}% of your max hp ({[ArtifactsAbilityTable.GlobalPerk_Artifact_Set1_LightFeet.ActivationCooldown]}s cooldown).
